The Gen AI Search Revolution

Gen AI has changed how customers discover brands. Large Language Models (LLMs) such as ChatGPT, Claude, Bing, Perplexity, and Gemini now serve as research tools, answering questions and influencing trust before customers visit your website.

Your visibility now relies on being referenced and regarded as a trusted source, not just being found.

VISIBI combines human expertise with Gen AI insights to ensure your brand is accurately represented and frequently cited in generative results.

What GEO Really Means

GEO - Generative Engine Optimisation - is the evolution of SEO for the Gen AI Search Era. It ensures Gen AI systems interpret, reference, and recommend your brand with confidence and consistency.

AIO (AI Optimisation)

Structured, entity-rich data to help LLMs understand your brand.

SEO Intelligence

EEAT-driven content, technical architecture, and schema excellence.

Human Expertise

Collaboration with renowned content creators whose writing naturally earns citations and positive sentiment.

Authority Context Optimisation (ACO)

Guiding PR partners with Gen AI visibility insights to shape how your brand is mentioned and perceived.

Sentiment Engineering

Ensuring Gen AI platforms associate your brand with accuracy, trust, and relevance.

VISIBI connects human creativity with machine interpretation, positioning your brand as a trusted source for Gen AI-generated answers.

Core Services

GEO Consultancy & Implementation

Comprehensive optimisation to enhance your brand's visibility in ChatGPT, Gemini, and Bing Copilot. We align structured data, content architecture, and entity signals for accurate Gen AI interpretation and discoverability.

SEO & Content Intelligence

We develop EEAT-driven, NLP-optimised content that establishes topical authority for both keyword and Gen AI-focused strategies. Our expert contributors create content recognised by both humans and Gen AI as reliable and trustworthy.

Authority Context Optimisation (ACO)

We work with PR agencies and internal teams to clarify Gen AI visibility mechanics and manage how your brand is mentioned in Gen AI contexts.

  • •Align PR narratives with GEO and EEAT principles.
  • •Identify content gaps and outreach opportunities.
  • •Find trusted publishers and influencers.
  • •Build campaigns Gen AI systems recognise as authoritative and contextually relevant.

We transform every earned mention into a visibility asset - strengthening your digital reputation with both audiences and Gen AI systems.

GEO Consultancy & Training

Training and enablement for internal teams covering:

  • •LLM prompt alignment
  • •AIO content structure
  • •Entity optimisation and sentiment tracking

Empowering brands to sustain Gen AI-era visibility independently.

Frequently Asked Questions

GEO is the practice of optimising content and digital presence so that Gen AI platforms like ChatGPT, Gemini, and Perplexity accurately discover, interpret, and reference your brand. Unlike traditional SEO, which focuses on ranking in search results, GEO ensures your brand is mentioned and cited within Gen AI-generated responses.
